pspReference.description: Adyen's 16-character string reference associated with the transaction/request. This value is globally unique; quote it when communicating with us about this request.

refusalReason.description: If the payment's authorisation is refused or an error occurs during authorisation, this field holds Adyen's mapped reason for the refusal or a description of the error.

refusalReasonCode.description: Code that specifies the refusal reason.
